pageTitle: USA Strong Men's Long Sleeve T-Shirt
textBeforeTable: Sizing Chart Cotton Grown in: USA Manufactured in: Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Haiti, Honduras, India, Mexico or Nicaragua Printed in: USA This USA Strong men's long sleeve t-shirt is 100% ringspun cotton. Preshrunk, soft-washed, garment-dyed fabric. Full cut for added comfort. Set-in sleeves. Ribbed collar with double-needle top stitched neckline. Double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hems. Taped shoulder-to-shoulder. 6.1 oz. 1" collar. It looks great and wears well.
